-1.title: Finale
-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: A Family Business
1.plot: Christie calls Animal Rescue to save a dog locked in a hot SUV.

2.title: Tow Wars
2.plot: A wedding cake is damaged after a tow; Christie confronts the outraged baker.

3.title: Chaos in the Yard
3.plot: Robbie tows an illegally parked rental car from the middle of a music video shoot, with chaotic results.

4.title: Broken Truce
4.plot: A short-staffed Robert Sr. jumps back in the saddle for a routine tow, only to have a hostile encounter.

5.title: Training Day
5.plot: Eddie needs back-up when there is an attempt to stop the tow of a rented Lamborghini.

6.title: Anger Management
6.plot: New driver Bernice continues to violate Tremont protocol, forcing a showdown.

7.title: Muay Thai Surprise
7.plot: A repo from a yoga studio goes awry when father and son tangle with the vehicle owner.

8.title: Memorial Day Mayhem
8.plot: With Robert in the hospital, the others must run the company on the busiest towing weekend of the year.

9.title: Growing Pains
9.plot: Tremont's move to a new facility tests Robert Sr. and his staff.

10.title: Taking Out the Trash
10.plot: Robert Jr. lets his guard down while attempting to repo a Porsche, with brutal consequences.

11.title: Assault on Tremont Towing
11.plot: Perez's tow of a custom Chevy leads a pack of rowdy football fans to the tow yard.

12.title: Sand in the Face
12.plot: Perez tangles with an out-of-control dental patient.

13.title: The Hurricane
13.plot: The tow of an RV leads to an off-the-wall couple taking up residence in the Tremont waiting room.

14.title: Unlicensed to Drive
14.plot: Eddie is accosted by a nasty rich girl with a pink BMW - and a secret.

15.title: Stranded
15.plot: Robert Sr., Robert Jr., and Perez head to the Everglades on the repo of an airboat.

16.title: Search and Rescue
16.plot: Bernice and Jerome travel to the Everglades to rescue their missing coworkers.

17.title: A Very Tremont Christmas
17.plot: A mysterious present wreaks havoc on the Tremont crew.

18.title: The Dog House
18.plot: Bernice tows a car belonging to a guy on house arrest, leading to a life-threatening confrontation.

19.title: Money All Day
19.plot: Bernice exacts revenge on Perez during a repo at a custom auto shop.

20.title: Trouble at Tremont
20.plot: In the wake of Christie's departure, an overwhelmed Robert Sr. loses control of the yard and a pack of angry vehicle owners escape with their cars. And, Robbie confronts Perez in an effort to get Christie back, but a shocking explosion stops them all in their tracks.

21.title: Goodfellas
21.plot: Robbie's efforts to bring Christie back to Tremont are thwarted by an explosive attack.? Bernice gets smashed by aggressive frat guys.? Robbie and Jerome get more than they bargained for when attempting to tow a limo from a busy hotel.? Larry and Perez crash Tremont with a shocking ultimatum.

1.title: Bernice Pops Off
1.plot: When Robbie and Bernice crash an open house to repo the realtor's Maserati, an oceanside struggle ends in a big splash.

2.title: The Heat Is On
2.plot: When Robbie and Bernice hope to cash in on an easy repo, a stage mom from hell puts a crimp in their plans. While assigned to a tow in a sushi restaurant parking lot, Eddie gets seriously lost in translation.

3.title: Lights Out
3.plot: Bernice tries to tow the van of the electrician who has come to fix Tremont's power outage.

4.title: No Country for Perez
4.plot: Perez gets rehired. Eddie and Bernice interrupt a booty-shaking video shoot.

5.title: Ruthless
5.plot: Midwestern tourists cross Bernice. Perez handles a club kid poser.

6.title: What's Up with Christie?
6.plot: A rival tower attempts to poach Robbie's repo, but the confrontation soon takes a bizarre turn.

7.title: The Last to Know
7.plot: Jerome does a good deed for disgruntled senior citizens.

8.title: Black Dahlia
8.plot: Christie must contend with a beautiful new dispatcher who mixes things up at Tremont.

9.title: The Inspection
9.plot: A surprise inspection puts Tremont's survival in jeopardy.

10.title: Hit It and Quit It
10.plot: Jerome's player ways lead to trouble in the field. Christie searches for a new dispatcher.

11.title: Storm Clouds
11.plot: With Larry's loan due in ten days, news of an impending tropical storm throws the Tremont crew into a panic.

12.title: Go Down Towing
12.plot: Robbie gets shot with a tranquilizer by a delinquent reptile wrangler.

13.title: Snakes in the Yard
13.plot: It's judgment day for Tremont, Robert Sr. is still missing, and Robbie doesn't have the money to pay back Larry's loan.

14.title: Who's the Boss
14.plot: As Christie rapidly approaches motherhood, Robert mulls over a decision that could have a major impact on the business and his family. Meanwhile, the repo of a competitive hair stylist leads to a surprise moneymaking opportunity for Bernice.

15.title: Run These Streets
15.plot: As the Ashenoffs gather at the hospital to celebrate their new addition, Christie makes an unexpected decision about her future with the company. Meanwhile, the new dispatcher unravels as things get out of control in the office, just as a larger-than-life old foe arrives who might make big trouble for Tremont.

16.title: Wide Load
16.plot: After uncovering a shocking secret about Bernice, rookie employee Dave Kosgrove accidentally finds himself in a compromising position at the tow lot, leaving the dispatch office in the lurch. Plus, Bernice finds herself on day care duty against her will.

17.title: Compromising Positions
17.plot: A dangerous carbon monoxide leak forces Tremont into tacky new digs. Meanwhile, Jerome's engagement to Wanda is in jeopardy when his crazy stalker resurfaces. Robbie and Perez are under pressure to bury the hatchet.

18.title: For Love or J-Money
18.plot: The recently dumped Jerome makes an unconventional play for his ex-girlfriend's heart, leading to trouble at Tremont.

19.title: The In-Laws
19.plot: Jerome has a less-than-ideal first meeting with his soon-to-be in-laws.

20.title: Everybody Hates Tremont
20.plot: Tremont is hit with a mysterious wave of public hatred that has Eddie caught in the crossfire.

21.title: Big and Beautiful
21.plot: In the wake of Tremont's viral video scandal and Robbie's suspension, Perez assumes control of the company - but his "business-first" philosophy leads to friction with the drivers.

22.title: Bumps in the Night
22.plot: When Perez hires an old friend to replace Eddie, Tremont's new driver violates a major rule of towing.

23.title: Tremont on Wheels
23.plot: A dangerous carbon monoxide leak forces Tremont into tacky new digs. Meanwhile, Jerome's engagement to Wanda is in jeopardy when his crazy stalker resurfaces. Robbie and Perez are under pressure to bury the hatchet.

24.title: Kosgrove Gets Krunk
24.plot: When J-Money's past comes back to haunt him, his pending nuptials come to a screeching halt.

25.title: Christie's Choice
25.plot: Robbie and Perez struggle for control of Tremont, with their fate in Christie's hands.

26.title: A Tremont Wedding
26.plot: Jerome's wedding plans are sabotaged, putting his relationship in jeopardy.

1.title: Tremont Got Served
1.plot: Three weeks after her promotion to General Manager, Christie is faced with Tremont's biggest crisis yet. Meanwhile, the honeymoon's over for newlywed Jerome, and Kosgrove pays the price for his indulgent lifestyle.

2.title: Eviction Conniption
2.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

3.title: Bernice Goes Down
3.plot: On the eve of Tremont's eviction, Bernice suffers a shocking injury and Eddie has an office blow-up leading Christie to make a critical decision about the company's future. Meanwhile, Kosgrove accidentally swallows Jerome's wedding ring.

4.title: Here Kitty
4.plot: Overwhelmed by Tremont's move to a new tow yard, Christie considers promoting a driver to Assistant Manager.

5.title: Dave's Dance Battle
5.plot: After learning how to Prancercise, Kosgrove puts his new skills to the test during a repo with Bernice.

6.title: Bernice's Revenge
6.plot: After a confrontation with a pair of nasty newlyweds, Bernice drags her unwitting coworkers on a vengeful repo road trip - all the way to Key West.

7.title: The Incredible Journey
7.plot: Stuck in Key West, Bernice and her crew scramble to locate their missing tow truck with the wrath of both Christie and Wanda looming overhead.

8.title: Roommates
8.plot: After Wanda throws him out, Jerome moves in with Bernice and her mom.

9.title: Bernice Unleashed
9.plot: While Christie attends a towing convention in Baltimore, Bernice struggles to maintain order at Tremont.

10.title: Casanova Kosgrove
10.plot: Christie comes back from Baltimore to a surprise. Kosgrove is in need of some help with the ladies and asks Jerome and Bernice for assistance.

11.title: Touchy-Feely
11.plot: Tremont threatens to collapse as Christie unravels her employees' secrets with explosive consequences. Meanwhile, Eddie's new age therapist sees an opportunity for healing at the workplace.

12.title: A Fashion Disaster
12.plot: Jerome's stalker returns to wreak havoc at Wanda's fashion show. Meanwhile, Perez approaches Robbie with a shady money-making opportunity.

13.title: The Struggle Is Real
13.plot: Kosgrove learns the true identity of his internet romance. Meanwhile, Perez and Robbie's secret partnership takes an explosive turn, and Christie is presented with an opportunity that could change everything at Tremont

14.title: Face Plant
14.plot: Bernice confronts Christie about a buyout proposal for Tremont while Robbie and Perez find that their side business isn't for the faint of heart. Jerome pines for Wanda while he and Bernice deal with the fallout of a sorority party, and Dave's casino date turns into a swampy struggle for survival.

15.title: Game Changer
15.plot: Jerome and Bernice venture into the Everglades to rescue Kosgrove. Robbie finds a new employee in an old acquaintance. Eddie learns what life on the farm is really like, and Christie discovers some game changing information about the possible sale of Tremont.

16.title: Little Man, Big Donk
16.plot: Bernice gives Tremont's new driver, Davy, a towing tutorial. Kosgrove's unusual new car draws some unwanted attention. Eddie returns to find that times are tough at Tremont. Jerome acts on his suspicions toward Wanda. And Perez drops some heavy news on Robbie that turns his world upside down.

17.title: Take the Money
17.plot: Perez offers Robbie a loan to settle up with Christie. Eddie comes back to Tremont on new terms. Jerome gets antsy with his private eye. When Kosgrove's donk is stolen, the Tremont family scrambles to track it down. Christie makes a final decision about the future of Tremont.

18.title: Spanglish
18.plot: Christie faces the repercussions of turning down Felix's offer. Bernice highjacks a test drive. Kosgrove's broken Spanish puts him and Eddie in jeopardy. Arrows fly when Perez and Robbie try to repo a huge RV.

19.title: Creepin'
19.plot: Bernice gives Tremont's new driver, Davy, a towing tutorial. Kosgrove's unusual new car draws some unwanted attention. Eddie returns to find that times are tough at Tremont. Jerome acts on his suspicions toward Wanda. And Perez drops some heavy news on Robbie that turns his world upside down.

20.title: Sink or Swim
20.plot: Jerome and Davy encounter a brokedown party bus, Robbie repos a Corvette and comes face to face with a paint sprayer and Bernice goes to new extremes to repossess a yacht. Marielix drops a bomb on Kosgrove.

21.title: Adios Kosgrove
21.plot: The Tremont gang gathers to say goodbye to a Venezuela-bound Kosgrove. Meanwhile, Robbie is forced to infiltrate a chop shop, and Davy squares off against an aggressive 12 year old.

22.title: Mystery Date
22.plot: Christie unravels the secret of Perez's side-business. Meanwhile, Bernice discovers the identity of her secret admirer, and Eddie dispenses wisdom to an irate vehicle owner.

23.title: 50 Shades of Bernice
23.plot: Bernice uses her sex appeal to score a big-money repo. Meanwhile, Jerome declares his love for Brandiss -- and attracts renewed attention from his stalker.

24.title: Perez Strikes Back
24.plot: Perez files a consumer complaint against Tremont, prompting a surprise inspection from Kosgrove's arch-nemesis. Meanwhile, Jerome deals with the fallout from a drunken fling with his crazy sexy stalker, and Bernice goes head-to-head with Robbie on a repo.

25.title: On the Floor
25.plot: Tremont unravels in the wake of failing its county inspection. Meanwhile, Jerome's stalker makes a mess of his tows, and Bernice's mom delivers a shocking ultimatum.

26.title: Deuces, Tremont
26.plot: Will this be the end for Tremont Towing? Whilst Robbie and Perez may also be in trouble, could this battle of gone too far?

1.title: Apocalypse Tow
1.plot: On the eve of her move to Detroit, Bernice hatches an all-or-nothing plan to stay in Miami. Meanwhile, Jerome confronts a rapping mermaid, and Christie and Perez's partnership starts with a bang.

2.title: Flipping Out
2.plot: While Christie and Perez scramble to find a new towyard, Eddie and Davy are stuck on the streets with a $600,000 car on the hook. Meanwhile, Bernice loses it on a wannabe rapper, and Jerome plays hero to a distraught young woman with a thirst for revenge.

3.title: Legend of the Swamp Ape
3.plot: Eager for a quick buck, Perez forces Kosgrove to pose as a mythical swamp beast - with disastrous consequences. Meanwhile, Bernice contends with J-Money and his "Mini-Money" on a repo, and Davy faces the wrath of one of Miami's top models.

4.title: Pulling the Plug
4.plot: Bernice and Reva's food truck has a disastrous opening night. Jerome loses track of Mini-Money during a chaotic tow. A shocking accident befalls Kosgrove.

5.title: A Taste of Bernice
5.plot: Bernice is forced to stage a marathon dinner party for Inspector Santiago. Jerome and Mini-Money charm the ladies of South Beach. An understaffed Christie contemplates a surprising new hire.

6.title: Maximum Power
6.plot: Bernice considers an unethical offer to upgrade her food truck. Nikki's first repo leads to a death-defying chase. Davy has a terrifying encounter with his 'roid-raging nemesis.

7.title: Family Therapy
7.plot: Bernice, Jerome, and Mini-Money go undercover on an unconventional repo. Meanwhile, Eddie squares off against a nature-hating redneck, and Kosgrove has a run-in with a skunk.

8.title: Towyard of Terror
8.plot: Bernice, Jerome, and Reva explore a haunted hospital. Back at the tow yard, Christie and Perez interrogate Nikki about the missing bank deposit, while Kosgrove is stalked by a sinister clown.

9.title: The Customer Is Always Wrong
9.plot: The grand opening of "Hood Tacos" ends in mayhem. Meanwhile, Jerome falls for his amnesia-stricken stalker, and Davy has a late-night rendezvous with Constellation.

10.title: Crazy in Love
10.plot: Jerome's stalker regains her memory, with electrifying consequences. A scheming Perez sees an opportunity in Robbie's return to the company. Bernice and Reva decide to "keep it real" with their customers at Hood Tacos.

11.title: South Beach Glo
11.plot: After her car gets towed, YouTube sensation GloZell Green works a shift in the dispatch office - with disastrous results. Meanwhile, Bernice rescues Jerome from the clutches of his stalker, and Robbie plays dress-up with a sexy housewife.

12.title: Pain & Gain
12.plot: Davy enters an amateur bodybuilding competition, with humiliating results. Meanwhile, Jerome grapples with the psychological fallout of his kidnapping, and Bernice and Reva's squabbling threatens to unravel Hood Tacos.

13.title: Checkmate
13.plot: Perez manipulates Robbie into handing him control of the company. Meanwhile, Kosgrove endures a plastic surgery disaster, Bernice and Reva's food truck gets stolen, and Jerome's PTSD spirals out of control.

14.title: Bernice's Top 20
14.plot: Bernice talks about some of her favorite scenes/episodes from the series in this Season 4 bonus episode.

imdb.title: South Beach Tow
plot: Towing vehicles while facing different levels of opposition from vehicle owners.::Anonymous
